title: Bugsplat hits again
body:
I was  connecting to my ranked game then bug splat and i had to enter the game again. while i was reconnecting my team remaked the game and i got leavebuster and a lose on my first 10 ranked games. Thanks rito.
EUNE: ZRZ JaCkSpaRRoW

replies.body:
Ouch, I'm sorry to hear about your unfortunate ranked loss. =/

A lot of Bugsplats have been going around as a result of some Windows 10 updates that pushed out some changes that enabled a feature called *Game DVR* inside the Windows Game Bar. This feature has been causing FPS issues and Bugsplats for some players, so I strongly recommend disabling the feature entirely using [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if this helped.
